questions.question: At what age is the human brain fully developed?
Which drug does not affect the maturation of the adolescent brain?

choices.answer: All of these affect the brain's development

questions.question: Which of the following is a risk to youth and young adults who use nicotine?

choices.answer: Reduced impulse control and ability to concentrate

questions.resources:
https://e-cigarettes.surgeongeneral.gov/getthefacts.html

"Nicotine can harm brains as they developâ€”which continues until age 25 or older! When youth and young adults expose their brains to nicotine, they are vulnerable to nicotine addiction, may have trouble paying attention and concentrating, and experience mood disorders and reduced impulse control. Nicotine may alter the way their brains function for the rest of their lives."

questions.question: Which tobacco product is most commonly used by US Middle and High School students?
Which of the following are reasons youth and young adults use e-cigarettes?

choices.answer: E-cigs are available in fun flavors - alcohol, candy, fruit

questions.question: What is another risk of e-cig usage?

choices.answer: Inhalation of unsafe levels of toxic metals

questions.question: What are the numbers of Middle and High Schoolers  vaping?

choices.answer: 1 in 8 High School Kids; 1 in 50 Middle School Kids

1 in 3 High School Kids; 1 in 20 Middle School Kids
1 in 10 High School Kids; 1 in 75 Middle School Kids
